maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Area: \v[area.forest.name]
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Lieu : \v[area.forest.name]

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: \c[3]Bulletin Board\c[0]
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: \c[3]Panneau d'affichage\c[0]

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Pi Ling
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Pi Ling

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Greetings, Seeker!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Bonjour à vous, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Are you looking for hints on how to get the \c[3]Shade\c[0] of this area?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Cherchez-vous des indices sur comment obtenir le \c[3]Symbole\c[0] de cette région ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: In that case, my grandmother should be able to help you!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Dans ce cas, ma grand-mère devrait pouvoir vous aider !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: You usually find her at the balcony at the very top.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Vous la trouverez sur le balcon tout en haut.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Pi Ling
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Pi Ling

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Greetings, Seeker!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Bonjour à vous, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Talk to the owner of this establishment to learn more about the shade of this area.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Parlez au propriétaire de cet établissement pour en apprendre plus sur le symbole de cette région.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: You usually find her at the balcony at the very top.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Vous la trouverez sur le balcon tout en haut.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Pi Ling
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Pi Ling

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: And did you talk to her?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Et ? Vous lui avez parlé ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: How?!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Comment ?!

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Yeah, I know. She is old and it is a bit hard to understand her.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Oui, je sais. Elle est vieille et elle est un peu difficile à comprendre.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: But she really does try to help.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Mais elle essaye vraiment de vous aider.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Just go to the \c[3]south\c[0] from here. Walk \c[3]through the bamboo\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Allez juste au \c[3]sud\c[0] d'ici. Marchez \c[3]à travers les bambous\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: There is somebody there that will help you.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Là-bas il y aura quelqu'un qui pourra vous aider.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Why?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Uhm... Do you wonder why I didn't tell you right away?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Euh... Vous vous demandez peut-être pourquoi je ne vous l'ai pas dit tout de suite ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: I-It's just tradition!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: C-C'est juste notre tradition à nous !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Also... she's always so happy when she's able to help.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Sinon... ça la rend toujours heureuse lorsqu'elle peut aider les gens.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: She doesn't get so much company these days, you see?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Elle n'a plus vraiment beaucoup de compagnie ces derniers temps, vous savez ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: So... thank you for talking to her!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Donc... merci, pour lui avoir parlé !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Bye!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Bye !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Just walk through the \c[3]bamboo trees\c[0] south of the \c[3]Cave Inn\c[0] to find somebody.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Marchez juste à travers la \c[3]forêt de bambou\c[0] au sud du l'\c[3]Auberge des Caves\c[0] pour trouver quelqu'un.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Such a kind lady.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Quelle gentille dame.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.note: de: une dame avec un coeur en or

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Pi Ling
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Pi Ling

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Just go to the \c[3]south\c[0] from here. Walk \c[3]through the bamboo\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Allez juste au \c[3]sud\c[0] d'ici. Marchez \c[3]à travers les bambous\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: There is somebody there that will help you.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Là-bas il y aura quelqu'un qui pourra vous aider.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Pi Ling
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Pi Ling

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Greetings, Seeker!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Bonjour à vous, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Ah! It seems you found what you have been looking for.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Ah ! On dirait que vous avez trouvé ce que vous êtes venu chercher.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Ah... it seems you already found that person at the bonfire, didn't you?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Ah... on dirait que vous avez déjà trouvé cette personne près du feu de camp, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Good luck in passing his trials! I've heard quite the stories from other seekers.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Bonne chance pour passer ses épreuves ! J'ai entendu de drôles d'histoires de la part d'autres \v[lore.title.seeker]s.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: If you happen to be stuck.... maybe grandmother can help you?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Si jamais vous êtes coincées... peut-être que grand-mère pourrait vous aider ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Or you know... she'd at least be happy to talk to you!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Où, sinon... elle sera au moins heureuse de vous parler !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: You find her around the balcony of the top-most floor.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Vous la trouverez autour du balcon du dernier étage.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: What a rude guy!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Quel rustre !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Typical self-centered player if you ask me.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Un joueur égoïste typique, si tu veux mon avis.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: You'd think he would have seen me \c[3]with those big glasses\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: On aurait pu penser qu'il m'aurait vu \c[3]avec ses grandes lunettes\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Salut !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: You're looking for that weird dude?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Tu cherches ce type étrange ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: He just ran past, even pushing me to the side.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Il vient de courir par ici, en me poussant même sur le côté.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: What a douche...
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Quel idiot...

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: "Whereabouts" Clue
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Indice "Séjour"
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.note: localisation, ou est ce qu'il se trouve/ce qu'il fait, but less direct

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Aaand back on the table.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Eeet de retour sur la table.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: This can is fascinating.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Cette canette est fascinante.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Can you stop the act already? I know this is not about the can.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Est-ce que tu pourrais arrêter ton cirque ? Je sais que ça n'a rien à voir avec la canette.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: It's... all about the can...
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: C'est... seulement pour la canette...

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Why won't you simply admit it? You like to sit on tables.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Pourquoi est-ce que tu ne veux pas l'admettre ? Tu aimes t'assoir sur les tables !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: No, it's not true!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Non, c'est pas vrai !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Why?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Huh?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Hein ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: See? Now even this random player here agrees!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Tu vois ? Même cette joueuse-là est d'accord avec moi !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: She should just admit it, right?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Elle devrait juste l'admettre, pas vrai ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: B-But...
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: M-Mais...

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Look, there is nothing...\. wrong about sitting on tables.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Écoute, il n'y a rien de...\. mal à s'assoir sur les tables.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: I mean sure... it's weird. But we're in a game. We're here to have fun.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Je veux dire... oui c'est étrange. Mais on est dans un jeu. On est ici pour s'amuser !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: If sitting on tables is your idea of fun then more power to you!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Si s'assoir sur les tables c'est ce qui t'amuses, alors tant mieux pour toi !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: But for so many years... people always told me to not do it. That it's bad manners.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Mais depuis toutes ces années... on m'a toujours dit de ne pas le faire. Que c'était des mauvaises manières.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Who cares, we're in CrossWorlds! This is a place to screw around and let loose!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Qu'est-ce que ça peut faire, on est dans CrossWorlds ! L'endroit idéal pour faire ce qu'on veut !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: And I definitely never saw any player being banned for sitting on a table.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Et je n'ai jamais vu un joueur se faire bannir pour s'être assis sur une table.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: You're right...
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Tu as raison...

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Of course I am!\. Just admit it!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Bien sûr que j'ai raison !\. Admets-le !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Alright!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: OK !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: I love sitting on tables!!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: J'adore m'asseoir sur les tables !!

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Sitting on tables is the best!!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: S'asseoir sur les tables c'est génial !!

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Everyone! Sitting on tables is amazing!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Écoutez tout le monde ! S'asseoir sur les tables c'est super !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Huh?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Hein ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: You see the world from a new angle!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Vous verrez le monde d'un angle différent !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: It will change your perspective on everything!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Ça changera la perspective que vous avez sur tout !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Damn girl, that's some deep stuff!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Hé, meuf, c'est du lourd ce que tu sors !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Thank you so much, you two!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Merci beaucoup, vous deux !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Finally I was able to open up!!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Enfin je vais pouvoir me lâcher !!

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: N-No, problem!\. You definitely seem more happy this way!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: A-Aucun problème !\. Tu as l'air véritablement plus heureuse comme ça !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: I am!!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: C'est sûr !!

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: I have to go now!\. I have to spread the message!!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Je dois y aller !\. Il faut que je le dise à tout le monde !!

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Oh dear, she really did a complete 180 there, didn't she?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Eh ben, elle vient de faire un virage à 180 là, non ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: I better have a look what she's up to now.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Je ferais mieux de voir ce qu'elle manigance.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: See you around!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: À plus tard !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Bye!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Bye !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Sai Ling
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Sai Ling

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Hello, Seeker!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: This is the \c[3]Cave Inn\c[0], a hostel built inside a house from the very beginnings of human activity on Planet Shadoon.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Vous vous trouvez à l'\c[3]Auberge des Caves\c[0], un hôtel construit dans une maison datant du tout début de la civilisation humaine sur cette planète.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: If I can offer you a room, please let me know.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Si vous souhaitez une chambre, dites-le-moi...

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: ...Is what I would say if there was actually any room free...
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: ... C'est ce que j'aurais dit s'il y avait au moins une chambre de libre...

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: ...Why?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: I'm afraid business is booming for us \c[3]Ling's\c[0] again.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Hélas je crains que les affaires reprennent fort pour nous les \c[3]Lings\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Which of course is nothing to be afraid of...
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Ce qui naturellement est une bonne chose...

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: However, our very own 24-7 shop, as well as a trade hub, are at your disposal.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: En tout cas, notre boutique 24h/24 7j/7, comme notre zone marchande, sont à votre disposition !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Please enjoy your stay!
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Nous vous souhaitons un agréable séjour !

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Paro Ling
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Paro Ling

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Your lot is pretty popular here these days, Seeker.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Des gens comme vous on en voit plein ces derniers temps, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: ...Why?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: I still remember when I left home to find luck in the big city, our Inn was almost done for.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Je me souviens encore lorsque j'ai quitté la maison pour tenter ma chance dans la grande ville, cette auberge était pas loin de fermer.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Imagine my surprise when I got a letter from my mother telling me to return.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Imaginez un peu ma surprise lorsque j'ai reçu une lettre de ma mère me disant de revenir.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Of course I could never refuse such a request. So my wife and I packed our things and moved here.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Bien sûr, je ne pouvais pas lui refuser ça. Donc moi et ma femme on a pris nos affaires et on a déménagé ici.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: And we don't regret it! My wife still has some trouble getting used to our traditions, but she always wanted to live somewhere calm and peaceful.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Et on le regrette pas ! Ma femme a toujours un peu de mal avec nos traditions, mais elle voulait toujours vivre dans un endroit calme et paisible.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Now that I think about it, benches in crossworld are very different from other games.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Maintenant que j'y pense, les bancs dans crossworld sont très différents des autres jeux.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Why so?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Because they are actually useful! In most games they are purely decorative and you can't really sit on them.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Parce qu'ils sont utiles, en fait ! Souvent dans les autres jeux ce ne sont que des décorations et on ne peut pas s'asseoir dessus.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Yeah, it's true that avatars allow proper sitting.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Oui, c'est vrai que les avatars permettent de s'asseoir.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Yet, it doesn't seem to be enough...
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Pourtant, ça n'a pas l'air d'être suffisant...

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: What do you mean?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Qu'est-ce que tu veux dire ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: I feel like everyone in this game is trying to sit at the strangest place they can find.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: J'ai l'impression que tout le monde dans ce jeu essaye de s'asseoir dans les endroits les plus étranges qu'ils peuvent trouver.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Oh, true, I even saw a girl sitting on a table not so long ago.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Oh, c'est vrai, j'ai même vu une fille s'asseoir sur une table il n'y a pas si longtemps.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: Right...\. But I was thinking of someone else.
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: Oui...\. Mais je pensais à quelqu'un d'autre.

maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.orig: What person could you possibly be talking about?
maps/forest/interior/inn-01.json/entitie.text: À qui tu pouvais bien penser ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.orig: Weapon best quality of Shad but now foremost we produce for human being.
maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.text: Armes de meilleure qualité des Shads, mais maintenant nous surtout produire pour humains.

maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.orig: How is your chest hunting going?
maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.text: Comment va ta chasse au trésor ?
Il m'en manque toujours un peu.

maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.orig: But I heard of a hidden path east of here.
maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.text: Mais j'ai cru comprendre qu'il y a un chemin caché à l'est d'ici.
Où c'est que tu as entendu ça ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.orig: Some \c[3]player with the lab coat skin\c[0] walked by, mumbling about it and stuff.
maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.text: Un \c[3]joueur avec une blouse blanche\c[0] est passé par là, en marmonnant à propos de ça.

maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.orig: What's up, wanna know about that path too?
maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.text: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ? Tu veux aussi trouver ce chemin ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.orig: It's somewhere in the eastern cavern system if I understood correctly.
maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.text: C'est quelque part dans le complexe de cavernes à l'est si j'ai bien compris.

maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.orig: He said something about using Electricity to charge some bots.
maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.text: Il parlait d'utiliser de l'Électricité pour charger des robots.

maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.orig: Not sure what he meant by that.
maps/forest/interior/inn-equip.json/enti.text: Je suis pas sûr de ce qu'il voulait dire par là.

maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.orig: Shop.\. It has the thing you buy.
maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.text: Boutique.\. On a les choses que vous voulez acheter.

maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.orig: So, found anything useful in here?
maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.text: Donc, tu as trouvé quelque chose d'utile là-dedans ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.orig: And this strange device in one of the storage rooms upstairs.
maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.text: Et aussi un appareil étrange dans une des salles de stockage à l'étage.

maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.orig: But it really didn't do anything.
maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.text: Mais ce truc ne faisait rien.

maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.orig: Are you ready to do the trials now?
maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.text: Tu es prête pour les épreuves maintenant ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.orig: Not yet, I used all my sandwiches on the boss before.
maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.text: Pas encore, j'ai utilisé tous mes sandwichs pour le dernier boss.

maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.orig: Care to spare a poor girl a few thousand credits?
maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.text: Tu n'aurais pas quelques milliers de crédits pour une pauvre fille ?

maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.orig: I already told you, they got rid of credits trading ages ago.
maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.text: Je te l'ai déjà dit, ils ont retiré les échanges de crédits il y a des lustres.

maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.orig: If you keep asking for items, you'll just look suspicious.
maps/forest/interior/inn-item.json/entit.text: Si tu continues de demander des objets, ça ne fera rien d'autre que te rendre suspecte.
